bike.description: D6 high modulus carbon, integrated T-T construction w/ internal shift cable routing, shaped oversized ride tuned down tube, integrated cupped head tube, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: D6 high modulus carbon stays w/ shaped ride tuned chainstay, carbon dropout w/ replaceable hanger and post disc brake mount

Shimano Deore XT w/ Hollow Tech II, 28/40T
Shimano Deore XT SGS Shadow top normal, 10-speed
Shimano Deore XT 32H hubs, WTB Laser Disc Trail rims
WTB Vulpine Race 29x2.1", aramid bead folding
Shimano Deore XT hydraulic disc, 180/160mm centerlock rotor
